text: Eugene "Mean Gene" Okerlund (December 19, 1942 - January 2, 2019) was an American pro wrestling commentator and announcer. He was most known for his time with both then-World Wrestling Federation (WWF), now World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE), and World Championship Wrestling (WCW). He was the host of WWE Vintage Collection. Okerlund died on January 2, 2019 at a hospital in Sarasota, Florida of complications from a fall at the age of 76.Gene Okerlund, gentlemanly announcer of pro wrestling, dies at 76 ==References == Category:1942 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls in the United States Category:American sports commentators Category:Organ transplant recipients Category:Professional wrestling announcers Category:Sportspeople from Minnesota Category:Sportspeople from Florida Category:WWE Hall of Fame
title: Gene Okerlund
